title: Work Accounter
name: workaccounter
description: Keeps you accountable to doing your work by tracking your website visits.

preferences.name: timeout
preferences.description: How many seconds to show the panel on visit.
preferences.title: Panel Timeout

preferences.name: statsurl
preferences.description: The URL of your Accountability website.
preferences.title: Stats URL

preferences.name: apikey
preferences.description: The API Key provided by your Accountability website.
preferences.title: API Key
